Articles.Content:
hype train departing

![HypeTrain-Departing3.jpg](http://alpha.renegrade.net/images/HypeTrain-Departing3.jpg)

For your hype enjoyment

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/W0AIF9rLqf4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
I wonder if the Kraken drive died.
There is nearly 2600 guests viewing the forums right now. What if everyone signed up and jumped on the hype train??? Can you imagine clicking next page and there being 20 more pages!!!
Uhhh it has been called off, release is not today... go home and don't forget to close steam ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Swiggity swype, I'm commin' for that hype.

> 
> Have some moar hype..
> [http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/490/096/882.gif](http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/490/096/882.gif)

2spooky4me

> 
> Guys I don't know how you did it, but we are still ACCELLERATING and have broken warp factor 6.6. We are travelling at billions of times lightspeed! It's going to be a heck of an accelleration when we stop. Who's that HypeTrain nosecone guy? Worior or something? Be prepared to ablate in Kerbin's atmosphere! Helluva aerobraking ahead.

Prepare to eject into the overhauled atmosphere of Kerbin!

I don't want to spam for no reason, but...

HYPE! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Guys I don't know how you did it, but we are still ACCELLERATING and have broken warp factor 6.6. We are travelling at billions of times lightspeed! It's going to be a heck of an accelleration when we stop. Who's that HypeTrain nosecone guy? Worior or something? Be prepared to ablate in Kerbin's atmosphere! Helluva aerobraking ahead.

Nothing is too fast for the hype train! Send that throttle to 300%!!
but 300 is just a number... this post have to go where no kerbal has gone before!
Hype!!

> 
> Who will have the legendary 300 post? Tune in next week to find out.

tune in at the next page to find out

> 
> i don't want to spam for no reason, but...
> Hype! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

what is spam? We know only hype
oh god i have to leave soon, and I know Kasper's waiting till I'm out the door to press the button

> 
> Uhhh it has been called off, release is not today... go home and don't forget to close steam ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Burn the heathen!

> 
> I don't want to spam for no reason, but...
> HYPE! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I want to spam for no reason!

HYPE!
The train's going so fast it can penetrate through the kraken
Hypetrain is too hype of all the hype! HYPE!

> 
> Guys I don't know how you did it, but we are still ACCELLERATING and have broken warp factor 6.6. We are travelling at billions of times lightspeed! It's going to be a heck of an accelleration when we stop. Who's that HypeTrain nosecone guy? Worior or something? Be prepared to ablate in Kerbin's atmosphere! Helluva aerobraking ahead.

Hey, you woke up. Now we can steer this thing.0

> 
> Uhhh it has been called off, release is not today... go home and don't forget to close steam ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Throw him off the train quick! He's slowing us down.

> 
> Uhhh it has been called off, release is not today... go home and don't forget to close steam ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Uh-huh. Nice try, but you're not gonna damper my hype!
If page 300 is reached, let's go for 300 ppm!!! (posts per minute)
I'm imploding
This post will be made 20 posts ago, and posted now.
3000 posts or bust.
